posts.post_content: Looking for off back Reds. Will consider all players but moreover searching for EPDG cards and Mowrey any off back, but I'll consider any player, any off back. PM what you have. Thanks
I have this Cycle 350 Egan. $375 Shipped via PayPal. thanks Daryl
Egan gets my vote for creepiest t206 image lol. Thanks Daryl, another one off the list. Still need several more
Thanks Todd. He don't look that bad here.

Best,
